fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / speed hangover
fields.Condition: DayCount() == 2  and  Variable["whirling.elchem_orb_speed_hangover_done"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed_done"] == false
fields.Description: Electrochemistry informs you that you're low on amphetamines in your bloodstream.

fields.Title: START
input
Electrochemistry: "Speed is a potent central nervous s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Speed is a potent central nervous system stimulant. It kept you propped up all day yesterday despite your debilitating hangover. How else did you think you even got up from this floor?

fields.Title: You: "What chick?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What chick?

fields.Title: speed_hangover
You: "I need to get more of it then. *Det..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I need to get more of it then. *Detecting* is my life. (Opt in.)

fields.Title: You: "No, that's not it. *Really* I feel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, that's not it. *Really* I feel super-good.

fields.Title: You: "No. I can take this. I am not going..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. I can take this. I am not going to go looking for speed.

fields.Title: You: "Who am I kidding? Of course I want..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Who am I kidding? Of course I want some speed. (Opt in.)

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "It's power, man. It's professionali..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's power, man. It's professionalism. It makes you feel like you're young again and ready to *detect*! Ready to go to war against the world!

fields.Title: You: "Is that how it's going to be now wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Is that how it's going to be now when I close my eyes?

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Oh, just a dream. You have ones lik..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, just a dream. You have ones like that all the time. You feel even worse this morning than you did last night.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Yes. Wait till you see the one with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. Wait till you see the one with the chick in it, it's gonna be a good one. You feel even worse this morning than you did last night.

fields.Title: why_is_speed
You: "Why is this happening?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Why is this happening?

fields.Title: You: "I think Cuno might have speed. I sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I think Cuno might have speed. I should ask him and start blasting again. (Opt in.)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["yard.cuno_cuno_sent_me"] == false  and  Variable["yard.shack_silverplate_orb_components_of_speedparty_on_mirror"] == false  and  (Variable["yard.cuno_logic_said_amphetamine"] == true  or  Variable["yard.cuno_perc_amphetamine"] == true)

fields.Title: speedhub
Electrochemistry: "Suit yourself, slow, sad shell-man...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Suit yourself, slow, sad shell-man. See how you do without your spark.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Are you sure? Ready to live as this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Are you sure? Ready to live as this pathetic shell of yourself for days?  Basically a week? Let's be honest -- two weeks, maybe three? You won't make it. Half the town will be dead by then. You will be fired.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Fast recovery, man! Quick turnaroun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fast recovery, man! Quick turnaround.  Superdetective back in action.

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.speed_volition"]
Variable["whirling.speed_volition"]
!(Variable["whirling.speed_volition"])
Electrochemistry: "You mean why are you so tired? Too..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You mean why are you so tired? Too tired and *down* to even think? It *is* worrying, isn't it. You can't be a detective like this -- detectives need to be able to think.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "It's just that your heart has final..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's just that your heart has finally pumped all the *speed* out of your system, buster. Time to get some more.

fields.Title: You: "Oh my god, what the hell was that....."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh my god, what the hell was that...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Don't be silly. There was no vow. Y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't be silly. There was no vow. You were high on speed. That was the only reason you got up. You can't *detect* without it, it's that simple.

fields.Title: Volition: "Don't do that. Stay strong. The han..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't do that. Stay strong. The hangover will wear off. You don't need to keep doing this to yourself.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Of course! Martinaise is speed-cent..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course! Martinaise is speed-central. You just gotta poke around, follow your nose.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "That's not really true. Your heart..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's not really true. Your heart has finally pumped all the *speed* out of your system, buster. Time to get some more.

fields.Title: You: "What the hell is going on with me?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What the hell is going on with me?

fields.Title: You: "I just had the most beautiful dream..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I just had the most beautiful dream. Uplifting. Rejuvenating.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Really? Because you feel even worse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Really? Because you feel even worse this morning than you did last night.

fields.Title: Volition: "You got up from this floor because..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You got up from this floor because of a holy vow you made sixteen years ago. With *me*. To wake up exactly 07:30 every morning until the day you die.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Good going, buddy."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good going, buddy.

fields.Title: You: "That's a lie. I can do this without..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's a lie. I can do this without the speed. Half the town won't be dead... (Opt out.)

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "You don't know? Some broad that mes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You don't know? Some broad that messed you up. It'll come to you. It always does.

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.speed_volition"]
Variable["whirling.speed_volition"]
!(Variable["whirling.speed_volition"])
Volition: "You're too weak to say 'no' now. Wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're too weak to say 'no' now. Waking up is the worst part. Maybe somewhere down the line you could decline...

fields.Title: You: "Wait. What *is*... speed?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait. What *is*... speed?

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "You and speed will be happy again...."
fields.Dialogue Text: You and speed will be happy again. You will make her come home. This time it will be different.
